level.heading: Public place defined.
level.text: For the purposes of § 47-2885.17, the term "public place" means any street, sidewalk, bridge, alley, plaza, park, driveway, parking lot, transportation facility, or the doorways and entrance ways to any building which fronts on any of these locations, or a motor vehicle in or on any such place.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 enacted this subchapter into law.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-57
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-57, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2885.17.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: The phrase "§ 47-2885.17" was substituted for "this act" near the beginning of this section for clarity. The act referred to was D.C. Law 4-57.
